price: ហើយយើងបានធ្វើឱ្យពួកគេដេកលក់នៅក្នុងរូងភ្នំអស់ រយៈពេលជាច្រើនឆ្នាំ។
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
